TopicTitle: Kai TA-50 [Advanced Jet Trainer / Combat Jet Trainer]

Articles.Content:
The ROK needed some replica love.

This thing's stable and rather maneuverable, which makes it a really good trainer. Under 100 parts to run on most computers, and four pylons for various payload pods.

If anyone one wants a download, sound off below and I'll update the OP.

TA-50 PH (Phillipines export variant)
